meteringCharges.description: Fees and charges charged by the distributor are published on the Essential Energy's website and may change from time to time.For more information,call  1300 933 039
meteringCharges.displayName: Additional fees may apply. For more information, please call 1300 933 039

meteringCharges.displayName: Additional fees may apply. For more information, please call 1300933 039

fees.description: Disconnection fee (inc. GST), only applies for move-out requests
Connection fee (inc. GST), only applies for move-in requests
Direct debit dishonour payment fee (inc. GST)
A fee of 1.1% (inc GST) of the total payment amount applies to payments made by Visa or Mastercard. For further information, please refer to our website at https://electricityinabox.com.au/support/.

A fee of 3.3% (inc GST) of the total payment amount applies to payments made by AMEX (Adhoc payment). For further information, please refer to our website at https://electricityinabox.com.au/support/.
A fee of 4.4% (inc GST) of the total payment amount applies to payments made by AMEX (Direct Debit). For further information, please refer to our website at https://electricityinabox.com.au/support/.

electricityContract.terms: For futher details on the terms and conditions of the offer, please visit electricityinabox.com.au or call 1300 933 039
electricityContract.variation: If we are going to vary your Rates, we will provide you with written notice of the variation as soon as practicable  or no later than your next bill or in accordance with any applicable laws and codes.
electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Contract with us continues on an ongoing basis until you choose to terminate it with us or otherwise switch energy providers.
